IExtn : 2223 2318 2468 2553 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Shipping, Road Transport and Highways) #1l-5 Wa 6, 4dz7-10 , ETraT, 7f fvait-110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No.11041/217/2007-Admn: 29.09.2008 POLICY MATTERS ADMINISTRATION FINANCE [41/2008] (Decision taken of DR & QA Cell's File No. NHAIIDR & QA CellARB(III-C)/2008) Sub : Charges for conducting Arbitral Proceedings out side NHAI premises: As per the terms & conditions of the contract and the Arbitration & Conciliation Act;, 1996 the cost and expenses of Arbitration proceedings will be as determined by the Arbitral Tribunal (AT): In almost all the Arbitration case presently progressing in NHAI, the AT normally decides that till finalization of the Award, the cost and expenses will be shared equally by both the parties, which include expenses towards venue and catering services etc. 2_ It has been decided that; in case arrangement is to be made by NHAI, the Project Directors are authorized to incur expenses ranging from Rs. 4000/- to Rs. 8000/- per for arranging venue and catering etc. outside NHAI premises during conducting Arbitration hearings 3_ This issues with the approval of the Chairman: 29 (V.K: Shanma) General Manager (Admn:) To 1_ PS to Chairman 2.
